targets.query: SELECT distinct("total") FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'library_stats' AND "section_name" =~ /^$movieslibrary$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT sum("total") FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'library_stats' AND "section_name" =~ /^$tvlibrary$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "hash" FROM "Radarr" WHERE ("type" = 'Queue') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "protocol_id", "name"
SELECT distinct("hash") FROM "Sonarr" WHERE ("type" = 'Queue') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "protocol_id", "sxe", "name"

SELECT distinct("hash") FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'Session') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "friendly_name",  "title", "quality", "video_decision", "quality_profile", "platform", "product_version", "location", "player_state"
